AdminUpdateBook   

Description 

Updates book into the system. 

Pre condition 

1.Administer wants to update book information. 

Post condition 

1. selected book will be updated with new data. 

Basic Course of Action 

1.Administer visits the update book's page. 

2. Administer enters title. 

3.administer enters ISBN 

4. Administer enters author of the book. 

5.Administer enters year of the book. 

6.System verifies the required fields 

7.System verifies information is correct. 

8.System displays book with information entered. 

9 Use case ends.
